		Question: who was sir walter raleigh and what did he do
		Answer:
answer: Sir Walter Raleigh was an English explorer, writer, and courtier. He was born in 1552 and died in 1618. He was the son of Walter Raleigh and Catherine Champernowne. He was the father of Walter Raleigh and Carew Raleigh. He was the brother of John Gilbert. He was the author of "The Life of Raleigh".
